mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(product_id, member_id, product_count) values(#{productId}, #{memberId}, #{productCount})
mapper.select: select o.id, product_id, product_name, product_price, member_id, product_count, member_name, product_count * product_price total_price from tbl_member m join tbl_order o on o.member_id = m.id join tbl_product p on o.product_id = p.id and m.id = #{memberId} order by o.id desc
